idea-plugin.name: Code History Mining
idea-plugin.description:
This is proof-of-concept plugin for code history analysis.
How to use:
  • "VCS -> Code History Mining -> Grab Project History" to grab history from version control and save it as csv file
  • "VCS -> Code History Mining -> [choose cvs file]" to read history from csv and visualizes it (needs a browser with SVG support)
  • (also available as popup menu, alt+shift+H)
For more details and examples of visualizations see GitHub page.

See also code history miner web server and CLI with similar functionality.
